page.title: 08HOME LIFE
page.content: As my husband commutes 42 miles to work each day are weekends are our family time. The children swim at a nearby Leisure Centre on Saturday morning.My daughter rides in the afternoon while we garden. Fish fingers and chips is their favourite tea. We all watch television until the children's bedtime. We enjoy a relaxing meal with a bottle of wine aroud 8pm. Sometimes we have friends over for the evening but we rarely eat out in restaurants as we think it is expensive.On Sunday morning my husband golfs while I tidy the house. The children play in the garden or do homework. Sunday lunch,normally roast meat, is the only meal that we all eat together. We walk in Black Park with the dog in the afternoon. After a light supper the children bath wash their hair and go to bed. We read.
